text: Robert Clark Gregg (born April 2, 1962) is an American director, screenwriter, actor and voice artist. He has acted in both television and movies. Gregg is known for his role as Phil Coulson in Iron Man, Iron Man 2, Thor, and The Avengers. Gregg was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Gregg married Jennifer Grey in 2001. They have a daughter, Stella Gregg. They divorced in 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Boston Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from Massachusetts Category:Screenwriters from Massachusetts
title: Clark Gregg
